articles.author: Nimi Princewill
articles.title: Trump wants to talk business with Africa in hopes of countering China. But a US summit excludes Africa’s big players - CNN
articles.description: The White House hosted an “African leaders” summit of sorts this week. But only five countries from the continent of more than 50 nations were welcome to join.
articles.content:
The White House hosted an African leaders summit of sorts this week. But only five countries from the continent of more than 50 nations were welcome to join.
